alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:17AM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
